distribution.iterations: v.dx = v.worldx - v.previous_x;v.dy = v.worldy - v.previous_y;v.dz = v.worldz - v.previous_z;v.rx = v.radiusX * (1 + 0.25 * q.noise(v.worldz/8, v.worldx/8));v.rz = v.radiusZ * (1 + 0.25 * q.noise(v.worldx/8, v.worldz/8));t.base = math.pow(v.dx/v.rx, 2) + math.pow(v.dy/v.radiusY, 2) + math.pow(v.dz/v.rz, 2);return t.base < 1 && v.worldy <= v.previous_y;
